JobFullDesc: Position Title: Senior Advisor, Product ManagementPosition Location: Round Rock, TXJoin us as a Senior Advisor, Product Management in Round Rock, TX to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.What you’ll achieveYou will be responsible for delivering plans to optimize company’s products and services. Develops specific marketing and communications plans and activities for PowerEdge Server to establish, enhance or distinguish product placement within the competitive arena. Performs market research, monitors competitive activity, and identifies customers’ technical needs. Concentrates on company’s product/service capabilities and competitive environment to identify new growth areas, and new technology and emerging product/service opportunities. You will:Provides analysis and evaluation of key market statistics and customers technical requirements to define product strategies and identify product opportunities to expand market share.Evaluates in-depth market analysis and develops business case for optimization of existing products/solutions alternatives and/or to create the next generation of new products. Develops business plans, marketing strategy, and forecasts for solutions. Maintains current status of customer technical requirements for existing and future products.Supports product launch and provides sustaining efforts to enable quoting, validation, pricing, order entry, and fulfillment of products via internal sales tool and external web stores.  Guides product launches to ensure sales force readiness and optimize P&L impact of product transitions. Conducts competitive analysis to determine appropriate positioning and product messaging. Engages in and drives products and solutions through the phase release or solutions release process including business case and resource requirements.Identifies, evaluates and recommends marketing opportunities consistent with product line and solution objectives.Take the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table.
